Task One - 30 mins
- Update the user migration & Model &  API registration process to reflect the changes
        'first_name' => 'string', - required for reg
        'last_name'  => 'string',  - required for reg
        'email'  => 'string|unique',  - required for reg
        'password',  - required for reg
        'username' => 'based on first_name and last_name', -  autogenerated on user create
        'gender' => 'male, female',
        'age' => 'integer',
        'height' => 'float',
        'complexion' => 'dark, fair',
        'status' => 'active, disabled, blocked',
        'interest_set_at' => 'datetime',
        'preference_set_at' => 'datetime',
        'accepted_terms_at' => 'datetime',


        *Task Two - 30 mins Preference - user has one preference and preference belongs to user
- Create a route for preference_update and make sure the preference_set_at in the user table is updated 
when the user update preference for the first time*
    'gender' => 'male, female, both',
    'age_min' => 'integer',
    'age_max' => 'integer',,
    'distance' => 'float',
    'complexion' => 'dark, fair',
    'height' => 'integer',
